messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Hello to Everyone
messages.msgSnippet: **I will start unschooling in January because of my job.  I think my kids would this more than anything.  Any suggestion would help.** Just exploring the
messages.messageBody:
**I will start
unschooling in January because of my job. I think my kids would this
more than anything. Any suggestion would help.**

Just exploring the message boards on the unschooling.com website is a
great way to start. Poke around randomly or search for things that are
of particular relevance to you.

Betsy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Hello to Everyone
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome Dorothea, where are you from?  Do you live in Houston? Jen ... From: Dorothea Thornton To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday, October
messages.messageBody:
Welcome Dorothea, where are you from? Do you live in Houston?

Jen


----- Original Message -----
From: Dorothea Thornton
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, October 09, 2002 8:36 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Hello to Everyone


I just joined this group. Thanks to Sandra Dodd for the information
at the conference this weekend in Houston, Texas. My name is
Dorothea and my husband name is Barry. My daughter name is Elizabeth
and she is 11 yr old. I have two boys and their names are Ricky and
James. Ricky is 9 yr olds old and James in 2 yrs old. I will start
unschooling in January because of my job. I think my kids would this
more than anything. Any suggestion would help.

Dorothea

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/9/02 7:38:00 AM, dlheater91@... writes:

<< My name is
Dorothea >>

Hi Dorothea!

I'm leaving tomorrow for South Carolina, so if it seems like I'm not here,
I'll be back next week.

Lots of OTHER chatty and helpful people will be here though!

Sandra

messages.messageBody:
I just joined this group. Thanks to Sandra Dodd for the information
at the conference this weekend in Houston, Texas. My name is
Dorothea and my husband name is Barry. My daughter name is Elizabeth
and she is 11 yr old. I have two boys and their names are Ricky and
James. Ricky is 9 yr olds old and James in 2 yrs old. I will start
unschooling in January because of my job. I think my kids would this
more than anything. Any suggestion would help.

Dorothea
